snippet: Elisabeth Hasselbeck, who has been on the ABC show “The View” for 10 years, will join “Fox & Friends” in September.
abstract: Fox News announces sudden shake-up of its morning show Fox & Friends, hiring conservative voice Elisabeth Hasselbeck from ABC's The View to replace Gretchen Carlson, who has been a co-host of the morning show for seven years; she will start in mid-September, and Carlson will move to Fox News at an unspecified daytime hour.
lead_paragraph: Elisabeth Hasselbeck, who has been on the ABC show “The View” for 10 years, will join “Fox & Friends” in September.

headline.main: Conservative Voice Goes From ‘View’ to Fox News
headline.print_headline: Conservative Voice Goes From ‘View’ to Fox News
